name: A Trip Through Time and Eternity
creator: WHLDTITAN
description_md:
**VERY IMPORTANT - READ BEFORE PLAYING ! ! !**




**RULE #1**




This map uses a **CUSTOM TEXTURE PACK** to replace the music and to make the UI more fitting and also the replaces the sky.  
[Mediafire download link](https://www.mediafire.com/file/dtcscfniccuwn31/A_Trip_Through_Time_and_Eternity%25282%2529.zip/file) for the texture pack:  





**RULE #2**




You must use **OptiFine 1.19** or else the experience may not look good or may not work at all!  
*(Using shaders is completely fine but if the map looks bad I suggest turning it off)*




Every other info and help with starting the journey is inside the map at the spawn (X:0 Y:100 Z:0) but you should spawn there and notice it.  
**This map does require a little higher end computer since the huge structures in it take a lot of time to load on lower end PCs.** Upon starting the experience the whole thing is automated. *(There are also instructions to guide you back to spawn if you messed something up)* The whole process takes around 5 minutes. **Please read every sign the map offers because it is extremely useful!**




**Enjoy your travel!**

name: Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Ages Full World Recreation
creator: TheNerdyGinger
description_md:
This is a recreation of the entire world of The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Ages! Both the present and past versions of Labrynna are in the world at the same time, and you can teleport around the world freely with the Warp Scroll book.




I made an Oracle of Seasons recreation back in 2018. A few years later, I got the itch to do Oracle of Ages! I've been working on this on and off since January 2021, and now I've finally finished it in October 2023 after over 200 hours of in-game time!




Every location, town, cave, and dungeon is constructed block-for-block from scratch. The overworld locations are built with a 3x3x3 scale (meaning that every square in the Oracle of Seasons game is represented by a 3 block wide cube in Minecraft). The caves and dungeons use a 2x2x2 scale to prevent them from seeming too empty or spacious.




The world of Oracle of Ages colorful and beautiful, and I want to preserve that. Because of this, the download for this map includes a modified version of puffcap's Oracle of Seasons Resource Pack.  
Download the original pack here: [www.planetminecraft.com/texture\_pack/oracle-of-seasons-3855282](https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture_pack/oracle-of-seasons-3855282/).




Check out my YouTube channel! :<https://www.youtube.com/c/thenerdyginger>  
Join my Discord server! <https://discord.gg/J4wHryZtKm>




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/Labrynna%20Present.png)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/Labrynna%20Past.png)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/Level%203%20Moonlit%20Grotto.png)

name: Military Warfare Tycoon
creator: Dommus
description_md:
Welcome to **Military Warfare Tycoon**!




This map is a remake of the map of a popular Roblox game known as *Military Warfare Tycoon*, a game where you can build up a base and have battles amongst your friends.




The map includes everything that its Roblox equivalent does, although it isn't a functional tycoon in the same way that the Roblox game is.




Explore the bases, vehicles, cliffsides, and forests with your friends or on your own!




The map also contains several easter eggs for those that are a part of the MWT Roblox community. Can you find them all?




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/2023-08-09_23.29.56.png)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/2023-08-09_23.30.43.png)

name: Mystical Wonders of a Japanese Village
creator: kuyu12
description_md:
Welcome to a world of enchantment and awe as we embark on an unforgettable journey through a fantastical Japanese village in Minecraft!




In this immersive build video, prepare to be mesmerized by the intricate details and breathtaking architecture inspired by the rich cultural heritage of Japan.




From traditional wooden houses adorned with vibrant cherry blossom trees to serene bamboo groves and hidden shrines, every corner of this virtual oasis is a testament to the beauty and wonder of the Land of the Rising Sun.

name: Amethyst Ballroom
creator: Flamebird13
description_md:
This ballroom is designed after the ballroom from the movie/musical Anastasia. It is centered on amethyst and quartz and has copper and blackrock ceilings. The ballroom includes a balcony and various waiting rooms. It also has various rooms that can be decorated and adorned to your liking.




Outside there is a series of gardens and bridges all built to combine the surronding area with the ballroom.




Further off there are a series of mountains and valleys as found in the natural biome.

name: Palace of Westminster
creator: aguero
description_md:
**English:**




The Palace of Westminster is without a doubt the most famous Palace in the world! Built after a fire in 1834, the palace follows a neo-gothic style, has more than 1000 rooms, 100 staircases, and 5 km of corridors. To commemorate the Platinum Jubilee of Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II of the United Kingdom, which together with the Palace of Westminster: are the greatest symbols of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.




**PT:**




O Palácio de Westminster é sem duvida o Palácio mais famoso do mundo! construido após um incendio em 1834, o palácio segue um estilo neogotico, possui mais de 1000 salas, 100 escadarias, e 5 km de corredores. para comemorar o Jubileu de Platina de Vossa Majestade a Rainha Elizabeth II do Reino Unido, que junto com o Palácio de Westminster: são os maiores simbolos do Reino Unido da Grã-bretanha e Irlanda do Norte.

name: Grumbot777
creator: PsyKat777
description_md:
Aight dudes and dudettes, welcome to my Minecraft map! You're probably wondering what this even is. Well, let me tell you. So, I decided to upgrade Grumbot from Season 7 of Hermitcraft, and this was the result! I call it Grumbot777, which, as you can probably guess, is a combination of Grumbot and Psykat777(me).




But what does it do? Well you can input a total of 119 custom inputs, and I'm kind of lazy, so I don't want to count the outputs. Grumbot has 3 emotions: anger, sadness, and shock. Grumbot777 also has some basic memory(the circuits for which I invented myself), which can alter the outputted responses.




Believe it or not, I actually have a YouTube channel called, you guessed it, PsyKat777. There you can find the original video that demonstrates Grumbot777. The reason I put it here is so that people without Google Drive can access Grumbot777, which is what the world download in my video description is located in.




P.S. Sometimes diamonds can get stuck in Grumbot777's item filters, so if it's taking a while for Grumbot777 to give you an answer, check to see if the diamond is stuck.




P.P.S. There is a hidden feature which I hinted towards in my demonstration video, but never actually showed because I wanted people to discover it on their own. You can access it by inserting "Alohomora" into Grumbot777.

name: Maranatha High School
creator: Lord Jacob Williams
description_md:
This is a 1:1 scale recreation of the beautiful Maranatha High School campus (169 S St John Ave, Pasadena, CA 91105) in Minecraft. The exterior is complete, but the interiors are still closed off because many still need completion, so the map should more accurately be called "Maranatha During the Weekend." Nevertheless, it is a beautiful map that I built on my own over the course of a week, so I would be glad if you were to check it out!




Built using OptiFine 1.18.1 and WorldEdit 7.2.8.




Pictures taken with Sildurs Vibrant Shaders v1.21 Medium. No extra resource packs were used.

name: Portuguese Village
creator: Bruno1525_XD
description_md:
**Join our discord channel [HERE](https://discord.gg/rDax3VNRUA)!**




Hello, today we bring here a project that we have been working on for a long time, "Portuguese Village", a project where we tried to recreate a village in the north of Portugal.




More updates in the future.




**Q:** What is the version?                                                                                                                                                        




**A:** You can play in version 1.17 or 1.18;




**Q:** Why are there flat areas and some empty places?




**A:** We built the map of a flat world, so some empty area is normal;




**Q:** Can I use the map?




**A:** If you use the map, remember to give credits when leaving the to the map;




**Q:** Does it work on Minecraft Pocket Edition or Windows 10 Edition?                                                                                          




**A:** No, it is not possible.




Other Questions? Comment below.




Enjoy :)

name: SS Colossal
creator: Nicko91
description_md:
It's with great satisfaction that the NICKO91 shipyard presents the **SS COLOSSAL - DEFINITIVE EDITION**.




SS Colossal is a fictional ocean liner, inspired by the beautiful ships of the mid-20th century.




It's an ambitious project, started in 2011, which sought to overcome limits in shipbuilding in minecraft. There were days and nights trying to make a ship that looks good from the outside, but above all, complete inside.




I can say, in terms of facilities, that the Colossal owes almost nothing to a real liner.




After all these years since the original publication, I decided to play it again, and I was inspired to add more spaces and make some other improvements, given the new block options in the latest versions of minecraft.




Feel free to explore all of its details and have a good experience “on board”! :)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/1134.png)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/4310.png)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/46.jpg)

name: Noble Cinemas
creator: FilmGamerJ
description_md:
With thousands of theaters closed across the world, I was inspired to create this build as something special for others to explore. But, I was also inspired to build this due to recent nostalgia.




See, I actually used to work in a movie theater about a year ago. In fact, it was this very same theater. And due to my extended time there, I got to be very familiar with the grounds. So, through a combination of photographic memory, and user-submitted images from Google, I was able to look back in time to see every side and interior space, allowing me to recreate this theater, block by block. In every way, this is a very personal build for me, that I'd like to share with you.




I've also created a tour / behind-the-scenes video (included above) that explains a bit more about the construction process. So check that out too if you're curious.




In order to enjoy this map properly, you'll also need to download the Resource Pack I build, which features 70 custom blocks and textures. Without this pack, over 40% of the map will look incredibly bizarre, due to the blocks that had been replaced with alternate models.




I created these unique models (e.g. recliner seats, frozen ice machines, office computers, etc) in order to enhance the realism of the theater space, and to recreate both equipment and aesthetic elements that I distinctly remember from working there.




Also, if there are any items or textures you think should be added to this pack, please let me know. =)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/noble-cinemas_promo-shot_002.jpg)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/noble-cinemas_promo-shot_003.jpg)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/noble-cinemas_promo-shot_005.jpg)

name: Trump International Hotel & Tower Chicago
creator: NicbriTNT13
description_md:
This Minecraft version of Trump International Hotel & Tower Chicago is a very accurate, floor by floor model of the real building in Chicago.




On the ground floor, there is a full service lobby with lounges for the guests and residences of this prestigious building.




There is also a multitude of offices along with a ballroom, a conference room, bathrooms, and many elevators to get you where you need to go.




On floors 2-10, there is a full service parking garage with access to each parking floor with many parking spaces to choose from.




The 12th floor, is the amenities floor with the luxurious 5 star restaurant, The 16, along with The Terrace At Trump.




The same floor includes many amenities such as a spa, fitness room, a pool, 2 yoga classrooms and, many elevators.




On floors 13-20 there is many luxurious hotel rooms to choose from such as studios, 1 bedrooms, and 2 bedroom, and a few conference rooms.




On floors 22-32, is the first tower of residences with fully furnished units such as studios, 1 bedrooms, and 2 bedrooms.




On floors 34-49, is the second tower of residences with studios, one bedrooms, two bedrooms, and three bedrooms to choose from.




Floors 50-52 are penthouses with 4 penthouses that are half of the floor. The top penthouse is the whole floor with 6 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, 4 half bathrooms, 8 closets, 2 kitchens, 2 dining areas, 2 sitting areas, 1 den, 1 exercise room, and 1 media room.




There is a texture/resource pack that is included and will load automatically, so the world looks like the real building. You can also download it separately [**here**](http://www.mediafire.com/file/o70rfpdntwvup9b/Trump+International+Hotel+%26+Tower+Chicago+texture+pack.7z).




**The best version to play this in is 1.12 (Java Edition). The other versions might cause block issues.**




\*\*Photos rendered in chunky\*\*  
 **\*\*Recommended**: Sky Off & Optifine  
 \*\*River not included in download. Let me know if you want the world with the river.\*\*  
 \*\*When extracting: use 7-zip or WinRar and right click and then click the "Extract Files" button.\*\*




**Give credit to me if you use this on YouTube, internet, etc. by inserting a URL somewhere or map page.**




If there are any issues with the world or the download, let me know.  
 Created by: NicbriTNT13

![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/Sky%20View%202-100.png)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/2017-08-21_19.11.33.png)

name: Minecraft MusicMaker
creator: MaSp005
description_md:
This Minecraft Map allows you to literally build your song.By simply placing blocks at the right place, you can create your own music.




Placing blocks that play a sound at the right time - Is it as simple as that? Yes, it is.




BUT: This map is only available for Minecraft version 1.12.x!




You've got every possible note block sound of Minecraft available to make (awe-)some music.




**[Here's](http://bit.ly/noteblocks)** the list of sounds.




In this map is a tutorial to show you how to create music with this. It's so easy to understand!




**The only bad thing is:** You can't download your song as *\*.mp3* or *\*.wav* etc.




**FUTURE UPDATES:**  
I will, of course, update the map. I have planned to add:  
- Speed Changer  
- Better design  
- And your ideas




**Thank you for downloading! Have Fun with it!**

name: First Steps - A Minecraft Album
creator: Stockley_
description_md:
Hello everyone!




For the past several months I've been learning how to create my own music digitally, and I decided to share some of the songs I made with the rest of you! All of the songs are instrumental tracks, all inspired by video game music that I grew up listening to, so I decided what's better than showing off these songs in one of the biggest games from my childhood?!




While they're not the most impressive sounding songs in the world, I've made a map and a resource pack showcasing them off because I felt like sharing what I made is better than letting it just sit on my desktop without being heard!




There's 12 songs, all of which replace the default record songs in Minecraft, so if you prefer these over the originals, feel free to use the resource pack for your own personal use (it can be found in the saves folder)! And also feel free to use these songs for YouTube videos, podcasts, etc., as long as you give credit!




So I hope you enjoy what I've managed to put together, I'll take as much feedback as I can get :)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/mc%20maps%20first%20steps%202.png)

name: Water Temple
creator: jessy999
description_md:
This creation is a temple that hides many secrets.




In the lower floor of the temple there is a huge room which served as a gathering point for all inhabitants of the ocean.




Up to the present day, nobody knows what's up there. It is assumed that there is an antiperspirant there.




This building was built on a rock sand island and on the island there is only the tower.




The Toporians had many peoples (all peoples with the Official Topo Map).




Every people was known and they knew almost everything about them. The mainpeople "The Toporians" knew everything about every people ..... well, almost everything, there were 5 people who were very mysterious so much that the Toporians knew almost nothing about them.




They only knew the following:




These peoples called themselves pentagram pieces.




Not only did they have a temple that was open so that anyone (including other peoples) could enter it, but also a second temple called the "pentacle piece of temples." There were 3 floors in this temple.




The first floor (the entrance) was huge, so the whole people fit in. This floor had been built for ceremonies.




On the second floor, only the priests could arrive, or the king / queen.




On this floor were kept important papers and stone tablets telling their story.




There was not much information on the third floor, but it is thought that there was a pentagram piece there. Since it was carved in the Toporian stone tablets.




The peoples that should have these pentagram signs are ignis, aqua, terra, spiritus auras




[**My other Projects on PlanetMinecraft**](https://www.planetminecraft.com/member/jessy999/submissions/?morder=order_latest)  
**[Water Temple on PlanetMinecraft](https://www.planetminecraft.com/project/water-temple-4057161/)**




On my Planet Minecraft account you can find other stories but these are longer ^^

name: Nuketown - COD: Black Ops 2
creator: Nathan A
description_md:
A recreation of Black Ops 2's version of Nuketown. I know I'm not the first to do this, but take a look at the detail I put into building this.




It was made originally for Flan's mod minigames and other sorts of things, but there are no mods required to play on the actual map so I figured I'd share it with everyone I could.




While building this map, I literally sat in front of my TV with my PS3 on Nuketown while I built on my PC.




I included everything I could (minus a few background skyscrapers), including a good portion of the background buildings, mannequins, and a whole bunch more - even down to the correct angle of the map. It was built in solely vanilla MC (with a little help from World Edit), and should run in any 1.12 version.




Thanks for playing!

name: Levatonia
creator: Connor
description_md:
Levatonia is a map that started as a few creative plots that I pasted into a world and then added onto.




Explore several large towns complete with villagers and iron golems to keep you company.




Though the towns are all connected with a road and bridge system, going off the trail you will find many different types of forests, biomes and other structures to explore.




Some corners of the maps are home to hostile kingdoms of mobs who live in darkness while others are quite and peaceful.




I'll leave the rest for you to explore. This map was made by me alone using world edit and by hand.




I recommend using shaders if you want the map to look even better.




I plan to continue to update and add more things to this map as I think of ideas. if you find any problems with the map please let me know in the comments.




This map although originally a creation map can be used for whatever you desire. All I ask is when you use it provide a link to this page :)

name: Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons
creator: TheNerdyGinger/Origin_MC
description_md:
This is a recreation of the entire world of The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons!




Many Zelda worlds have been lovingly remade in Minecraft, but I have yet to see a completed version of Oracle of Seasons (which I consider to be an underrated title in the series).




I've had a ton of fun crafting the world of one of my favorite games, and have spent a total of 202 hours of in-game time working on this.




I hope you enjoy your 3D tour through this awesome game world!




Every location, town, cave, and dungeon is constructed block-for-block from scratch.




The overworld locations are built with a 3x3x3 scale (meaning that every square in the Oracle of Seasons game is represented by a 3 block wide cube in Minecraft).




The caves and dungeons use a 2x2x2 scale to prevent them from seeming too empty or spacious.




The map's spawnpoint also includes a "Warp Scroll" item which allows the player to teleport to any major location in the game. That way anyone can easily find their favorite areas!




The world of Oracle of Seasons colorful and beautiful, and I want to preserve that. Because of this, the download for this map includes a modified version of Knightworm's Oracle of Seasons Resource Pack. (With their permission of course)




Download the original pack [**here**](https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture_pack/oracle-of-seasons-3855282/).




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/2018-03-14_22.29.34.png)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/2018-02-14_12.47.41.png)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/2018-03-13_21.01.08.png)

name: Halloween Adventure
creator: whitelily36
description_md:
For a dare, you and your friends went camping in the Haunted Forest! You are woken by a voice calling your name.




Emerging from the tent you see a frightening face in front of you!




It is a Demon, who tells you he has taken your friends, and if you want to save them, you must complete 7 quests and fight the Demon himself!




Each quest will give you a relic, and only when you have all the relics can you face the Demon.




Quests: \* Relic of Portals \* Relic of Codes \* Relic of Riddles \* Relic of Potions \* Relic of Strength \* Relic of Speed \* Relic of DarkMagic.




Each quest is a different challenge, some requiring a boss fight, others requiring you to make a potion, or perform a parkour challenge!




Can you find all the relics and save your friends from the evil clutches of the Demon?




Blockheader and the wonderful team at Clownfish's Everyone Is Welcome Minecraft Server (IP: join.cfew.us)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/bridgeofdoom10618621.png)




![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/abandonedport10618614.png)

creator: V. Martian
description_md:
***Note: This map should work in any version from 1.8 to 1.12.***




Hello everybody!




If you are tired of playing in the already bored standard types of the world, then try playing on my map.




9 square kilometers of floating islands (3072\*3072 blocks). Most of the islands are huge, but also hundreds of small islands are scattered across the map. Several differently sized water lakes can be found on the islands.




Also on the map there are many different biomes:




On this map you can play with mods, all new ores will be generated. But since the islands are at a minimum of 45 blocks, then deeper ores will not be generated.




In most mods, this is easily corrected by changing the configuration.

name: Catching Fire

This is a replica of the Hunger Games arena of the second Hunger Game's book, Catching Fire.




This map was not made to be played but it is possible, if you wish to play this map, each player must start on one of the Gray platforms (The one you start in as soon as you enter) and then run to the Cornucopia (The white building in the middle).




Player's will then grab weapons and fight to death, if you wish, you can go hide in the forest.




The map can be played with 2-24 player's but as I said, it has not been made for that purpose




Do not go beyond the mountain range as you will find nothing behind it.

name: Big Giant Lightshow
creator: CDFDMAN
description_md:
A year in the making, I present to you the Big Giant Lightshow!




Originally made for Minecraft Realms, this vanilla 1.11 light show is a 20 minute concert experience unlike any other in Minecraft!




Start directing the show by pulling the red lever on the video console up in the tech booth.




In charge of the video board, you can control the cameras at the concert by switching between inventory slots!




This map includes amazing music from **[Big Giant Circles](https://www.youtube.com/user/BigGiantCircles)**!




(Music used with permission)




Special thanks to the following people for contributing to the development of this map.




This map uses cutscenes from [**TheRedstoneScientist**](https://twitter.com/ProfessorTRS).

**THIS MAP REQUIRES A RESOURCE PACK INCLUDED IN THE DOWNLOAD**

name: Project Nightmare
creator: ZeArtist
description_md:
The Project Nightmare Map is a Roller Coaster showcase that includes builds of all the animatronics from the FNAF Franchise, that is from the first game to the FNAF4 Halloween Update, to the new Sister Location game.




This map is just a coaster showing off the many builds that took many months to make.




This map all started from a Building Contest on a World I made for a local server for my friends, after some time it had evolved into a fun little project which included more builds, it wasn't until later that it became a coaster (experienced best with music).




There are other builds my friends and I have built outside of this coaster, so if downloaded, you may edit this world or explore as you wish.




Credit to Scott Cawthon for making the FNAF Games and Characters.




Hopefully you enjoy this map :D

name: Ashwick - The Lonely Isle
creator: dennisbuilds
description_md:
Heyo everyone,




I started this project around 5 to 6 months ago and I just had an idea about a great concept. But after finishing this I extended the whole island and I got more and more ideas.




So I added the huge face. I kinda liked the idea of an open mouth the be the entrance to something. I might add an interior to the whole island and that will be the entrance to it.




The clock was supposed to be on top of the waterweel but then something terrible happened. At that moment I knew I reached world height, everys builders struggle .\_. I managed to get them next to each other and connect them with the gears.




On the back of the island I added a fantasy building which is the home of the mages of the people on this island. You can read more of the lore below :)




Cheers,




- dennisbuilds




**[My Twitter](https://twitter.com/dennisbuilds)**




Over 200 Score ago, somewhere in the seven waters, there once was a hidden island which was called home by a marvelous civilisation, with timewise superb technology and beautiful architectual craftsmanship. This island's name was Ashwick.




Upon seing the island for the first time, you would have immediately noticed the grand clock and the gate of the guardian, which marked the entrance of the supreme mountain palace.




Unlike any other clock, this special timekeeper registered the arrival of something, which back then was unknown, though expected to be a god to arrive, but was soon to be indentified as the end of this civilisation.




The guardian depicts the first emperor's face of the civilisation of ashwick, whom founded the grand city with all its gold-wooden towers and brough glory upon the people by using the ancient celestial arts of magica and combining them with the art of the earthly man - science. His name though remained a mystery to anyone, so his people came to call him "their Guardian".




But the manmade constructions where not the only beauty that this now lost island of Ashwick beared, as the nature and the terrain itself were a work of godly art. With its collossal waterfalls and its unique cliff forests, which were formed by the giant trees which are rumored to have been there before man set foot on this world, the island is,or was, unlike any other place on this planet.




But as the centuries passed, the island was consumed by the water, and now is lost to the eye of man for eternity.




The people on the continents had many names for this legendary place. The greek called it atlantis, nordic tribes named it Alfheim, but we shall call it by its name, given by its guardian - Ashwick




~Chapter 3 - Chronics Of The Lost Worlds




**[Full HD renders](http://imgur.com/a/q4vSB)**




**![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/SVZC7Ky.jpg)**




**![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/c7zUvzB.jpg)**




**![](https://www.minecraftmaps.com/images/jdownloads/screenshots/n954sNn.png)**

name: Cruise Ship
creator: Poncharelli
description_md:
This cruise ship journey starts on an island inside the captain's house. There are signs directing you to the cruise ship terminal and you will be in charge of taking a tender boat straight ahead to the cruise ship to dock at the ship's gangway.




You can choose between going straight ahead with your boat to the smaller ship (built-in 2011) or the newer larger ship built-in 2014).




There are more than 500 guest rooms and more than 150 crew rooms, all varying in size from normal 1 person rooms to deluxe VIP rooms with LCD TVs as well as Captain/Staff Captain/Chief Security and other officers rooms.




You can also find features such as a theater with production shows to watch each night after dinner. You can also find restaurants, bars, a pool, a basketball court, a sunbathing deck, gift shops, the main foyer with a reception desk, a large engine room (ewww), and other secrets as well.




Enjoy your stay on Poncharelli's Cruise Ship v2.0!




Designed by Jacob Sawyer aka Poncharelli
